title: Cross-sell - Add a Line to Family Plan
description: An existing customer on a family plan wants to add a new line for their child.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current family plan details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has a family plan with one available slot.

tasks.description: Explain the monthly cost of adding the new line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly states the additional cost.

tasks.description: Process the request to add a new line and ship a new SIM card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the plan and orders a new SIM.
